chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Time to Be Gone
chapters.info:
Blaeric Negina,
      p. 107 (115)â€”One of
      Joline's Warders.  He has blue eyes, a pointed
      chin, and straight black hair.  He is tall, and from Shienar.  He now
      travels with Mat's entourage and
      Valan Luca's menagerie.
      See also
      Maza, Joline;
      Mizar, Fen.
